column5: I picked up this article from another forum. Since there have been posts in the past about carp in grocery stores I thought it would be cool to see the cultural significance of this fish. http://www.nytimes.com/2009/08/05/dining/0...ref=todayspaper
That was a terrific read, Lorne.  That roasting method they do sounds like a great way to prepare any kind of fish.
